vote.title: Authorize a thirty-six-month construction services contract for the 2022 Dallas Sidewalk Master Plan Improvements that includes water and wastewater adjustments at various locations throughout the City - Vescorp Construction, LLC dba Chavez Concrete Cutting, lowest responsible bidder of seven - Not to exceed $13,887,150.00 - Financing: Certificate of Obligation Funds ($6,922,812.89), Street and Alley Improvement Fund ($5,682,577.11), General Fund ($695,560.00), Water Construction Fund ($546,200.00) and Wastewater Construction Fund ($40,000.00) (subject to annual appropriations)
vote.description: Authorize a thirty-six-month construction services contract for the 2022 Dallas Sidewalk Master Plan Improvements that includes water and wastewater adjustments at various locations throughout the City - Vescorp Construction, LLC dba Chavez Concrete Cutting, lowest responsible bidder of seven - Not to exceed $13,887,150.00 - Financing: Certificate of Obligation Funds ($6,922,812.89), Street and Alley Improvement Fund ($5,682,577.11), General Fund ($695,560.00), Water Construction Fund ($546,200.00) and Wastewater Construction Fund ($40,000.00) (subject to annual appropriations)
